name: Rounded
description: To solve a diversity of problems you need a diverse tool set and a well-rounded team. Our clients show us their product and its purpose, we help them choose the medium and the message, and then together we build it. There are a daunting number of devices in the world. Let's work together to choose the right ones and build something beautiful. Our names are Rob, Ben, Eric and Eric, Andrew, Chad, Steve, Brian, Heather, and Kevin. We are Rounded.
